column2: Apostolic King

The Kingdom of the Holy Crown

It is a glorious day for the Coronite faithful: the Lands that have been united under the Holy Crown of Saint Stephen, after centuries, have been  at last reunited! Under the guidance of [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick], the Empire of the Sacra Corona may rise again to and above its former glory...
Vivat!
